description:
At the end of this course you will be able to run and host your own webinar.

You will learn how to relax into the webinar and to turn any nervousness to your advantage

You will understand how to easily plan your event and give great content to your attendees

Learn and Master how to make your Evergreen webinars

  • Build your own marketing list
  • Find the biggest issues in your niche
  • Answer those issues in your webinar
  • Become a recognized expert in your field

Webinars Are The Future For Business, Income Generation, Prospect & List Building. So You Need To Know How You Can Stay One Step Ahead Of Your Competition

A great strategy for start-ups to build reputation and brand awareness by talking to your audience.

You will see how easy it is to communicate with webinars.

You are going to the insight into the best way to answer your audience questions before you go live.

We walk through the set-up process step by step for both live and recorded webinars.

Webinars are one of our biggest tools in the online tool-box, communicate with a few or thousands anywhere in the world at any time.

During this course you will learn not just how to conduct a webinar but also how you can leverage the webinar with advanced marketing strategies.

You may be a Student, a Business Owner, A Charity Fundraise, a Team Co-Ordinator.

Weather you are raising money or just awareness you need to know how to use this powerful tool.

I have designed this course to be easily understood by absolute beginners and those of you that have some knowledge.

I use webinars every week and have made 100's so you are learning from someone who know...
title: How To Create & Monetize Your Webinar Mastery Course
